3: I am Mord. I serve my lord Kord with my greatsword.
5: As we walked, Air and Wander told us fantastic tales of the great dwarven carrot clan. They dig deep for gems and other stuff.
6: All Grins is apparently not from carrots. He from Hardly Grins.
7: For Napkin is getting a little frisky with wolf Low Show. I think For Napkin is a little bored with us.
8: We not have any more drink. And while a wolf is nice and all, not so much a dragon, me thinks.
9: We had to go single file along a path. Then Barrel and Air stopped.
10: Well, guard refused to let Pitter go. Me stay with Pitter to the bitter end.
11: I asked if he wanted to wrestle. He got this glint in his eye.
12: I see our people approach with a rather tallish dwarf. He looks important.
13: Mords of Wisdom: People not welcome their enemy's people.
